meanings.definition: The state or quality of being married.
meanings.sent1: Their nuptiality brought them joy and companionship.
meanings.sent2: The nuptiality of the couple was evident in their shared home and life together.
meanings.sent3: The nuptiality of the two lovebirds was celebrated with a grand wedding.
meanings.sent4: The nuptiality of their bond was as strong as the roots of an ancient tree.
meanings.sent5: The nuptiality of their union was like a beautiful melody that resonated through their lives.

meanings.definition: The act or ceremony of getting married.
meanings.sent1: The nuptiality of the royal couple was a grand affair.
meanings.sent2: The nuptiality took place in a charming little chapel by the sea.
meanings.sent3: The nuptiality of the two penguins was attended by all their friends in the colony.
meanings.sent4: The nuptiality of their union was like a dance of love and commitment.
meanings.sent5: The nuptiality of their vows echoed through the halls of the old church.
